content.query:
Drop table staging
GO
create table staging
(
    id int,
    name varchar(20),
    country varchar(30),
    DimensionCheckSum int default -1

)
with
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [id] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)

drop table SCD2
GO
create table SCD2
(
    id int,
    name varchar(20),
    country varchar(30),
    DimensionCheckSum int default -1,
    ValidFrom datetime,
    ValidTo date default '12/31/9999',
    CurrentRecord int default 1

)
with
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [id] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)

GO
insert into staging
values (1,'Acme','australia',-1)
insert into staging
values (2,'Bikerosoft','US',-1)
